definition: pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The swamp country is inclined to poach in winter.
sentences.chinese: 這片沼澤地帶在冬季一踏就陷下去。

sentences.english: His headquarters are somewhere in the Everglades, his gang are a mixed-up bunch.
sentences.chinese: 其總部設在某處沼澤地，他的團伙是一個混合了一堆。

sentences.english: Determined, the blonde turned and headed for the swamps, set on catching herself an alligator.
sentences.chinese: 女郎咬咬牙，回身向沼澤地走去，準備親手抓只鱷魚。

sentences.english: Salt flats in the west prevent a direct road from connecting to Kigoma.
sentences.chinese: 西部的鹽鹼沼澤地使道路不能直接連接尅高馬。

sentences.english: Amy Alden finds a nest of Goose's eggs.
sentences.chinese: 艾咪在沼澤地裏發現一窩野雁的蛋。

sentences.english: Your face would be sloughing off.
1947 - The Everglades National Park in Florida, USA is dedicated.
sentences.chinese: 1947年，美國佛羅里達州的沼澤地國家公園開放。

sentences.english: Wandering around in the Viera Wetlands are these Florida Soft Shell Turtles.
sentences.chinese: 這些佛羅里達甲魚正漫步於維耶拉沼澤地。

sentences.english: Peat slides are a regular feature of the Shetland bogs.
sentences.chinese: 泥炭地滑坡是設德蘭羣島沼澤地常見的特徵。

sentences.english: He drove into a bog, where his wheels stuck fast.
sentences.chinese: 他把車開進了一片沼澤地，輪子牢牢地陷在了裏面。

sentences.english: You wanted to rent a boat to see the Everglades swamp. That's expensive too.
sentences.chinese: 你原來還想和條船去看看沼澤地，那也很貴。

sentences.english: Hatchling alligators break free of their shells in Big Cypress Swamp in the Florida Everglades.
sentences.chinese: 在佛羅里達的巨柏沼澤地裏，兩隻幼鱷破殼而出。

sentences.english: The wind blown from the fens was damp.
sentences.chinese: 從沼澤地刮過來的風是潮溼的。

sentences.english: I got snookered into buying a swamp land in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 我被騙在弗裏達買了塊沼澤地。

sentences.english: However, in order to do this, we must went through a field of bog.
sentences.chinese: 然而，要繞到敵人後方，我們必須越過一片沼澤地。

sentences.english: The course includes a waist deep bog which the competitors have to negotiate.
sentences.chinese: 比賽中，挑戰者須要穿越齊腰深的沼澤地。

definition: (agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
enchanting scenery/beautiful surroundings/world of its own
